diff_act: 3.update the stored train data in the ETCS equipment
5.entering train data automatically from an external data source
6.consulting train data anytime through the DMI
7.shall be able to consult train data anytime via the DMI
8.may be entered automatically by the system

regen.absent_element: confirmation of train data when entering manually
regen.new_specification: The driver shall confirm the entered train data when entering manually before the on-board ETCS equipment allows train movement.

regen.absent_element: data validation after automatic or manual entry
regen.new_specification: The system shall validate train data for correctness and consistency after it has been entered manually or automatically before allowing train movement.
The driver shall confirm automatically entered train data before the on-board ETCS equipment allows train movement.

label: The driver shall be able to consult train data when the train is stationary or moving.
absence: action of consulting train data when moving
